request.title: AAA Parcel Schema
request.description: AAA profile parcel schema for POST request

privilege.description: Set Privilege Level for this user

pubkeyChain.description: List of RSA public-keys per user

vpn.description: Set VPN in which Radius server is located

sourceInterface.description: Set interface to use to reach Radius server

address.description: Set IP address of Radius server

authPort.description: Set Authentication port to use to connect to Radius server

acctPort.description: Set Accounting port to use to connect to Radius server

timeout.description: Configure how long to wait for replies from the Radius server

retransmit.description: Configure how many times to contact this Radius server

key.description: Set the Radius server shared key

secretKey.description: Set the Radius server shared type 7 encrypted key

keyEnum.description: Type of encyption. To be used for type 6

vpn.description: Set VPN in which TACACS server is located

sourceInterface.description: Set interface to use to reach TACACS server

address.description: Set IP address of TACACS server

timeout.description: Configure how long to wait for replies from the TACACS server

key.description: Set the TACACS server shared key

secretKey.description: Set the TACACS server shared type 7 encrypted key

keyEnum.description: Type of encyption. To be used for type 6

level.description: Privilege level when method is commands

startStop.description: Record start and stop without waiting

level.description: Privilege level when method is commands

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for AAA profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
